column1: You had a procedure called brachytherapy to treat prostate cancer.
You probably may have also had a Foley catheter (tube) in your bladder to drain urine.
Your doctor used CT scans or ultrasound to view the area to be treated.
Apply ice packs to the area for 20 minutes at a time to reduce pain and swelling.
You may need to have follow up visits with your provider for more treatment or imaging tests.
